attributes.action: grant all Gurkha soldiers who have served with HM Armed Forces and retired prior to 1997 the right to settle in the UK and enjoy the benefits extended to all UK citizens in recognition of their unswerving loyalty to our Crown and Country since 1814.  Thank you guys - from a grateful nation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Gurkha-soldiers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
